snippet.title: Dark Planet: Battle for Natrolis Official Trailer (2002,  Creative Edge Software/Ubisoft)
snippet.description:
Game Description courtesy of MobyGames:
"For eons, the planet Natrolis was controlled by the magic of the reptilian Sorin race. But when a fleet of tech-powered humans arrives to colonize the surface, they awaken the unimaginable - the Dreil, a hyper-evolved insectoid warrior race hibernating deep within the planet's core. Now, all three forces collide in a mortal struggle for domination. A mix of Starcraft and C&C type RTS. Choose from 3 sides and blow them away."


Gamer's Temple describes the game as:
"a game that looks great and has some interesting ideas" although it "falls flat in several key areas".

Gamers "might be interested in Dark Planet for some of its more innovative features, but ... might find its shortcomings to prove to be too frustrating.

Full review here:
http://www.gamerstemple.com/game-reviews/pc/238/dark-planet-battle-for-natrolis-review

Get the Demo:
http://download.cnet.com/Dark-Planet-Battle-for-Natrolis-demo/3000-7483_4-10229145.html
